thread.title: BRIEF-Automodular Corp Says It Reached Settlement In Its Claim Against General Motors Company And General Motors Of Canada

title: BRIEF-Automodular Corp Says It Reached Settlement In Its Claim Against General Motors Company And General Motors Of Canada

organizations.name: claim against general motors company and general motors of canada reuters staff

text: Market News February 20, 2018 / 2:48 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Automodular Corp Says It Reached Settlement In Its Claim Against General Motors Company And General Motors Of Canada Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 20 (Reuters) - Automodular Corp: * AUTOMODULAR CORP SAYS HAS REACHED A SETTLEMENT IN ITS LEGAL CLAIM AGAINST GENERAL MOTORS COMPANY AND GENERAL MOTORS OF CANADA LIMITED * AUTOMODULAR CORP - SETTLEMENT RELATES TO TERMINATION OF A CONTRACT FOR SEQUENCING AND SUB-ASSEMBLY SERVICES * AUTOMODULAR CORP - PURSUANT TO SETTLEMENT, AMD WILL RECEIVE A PAYMENT OF $7 MILLION BY MARCH 6 * AUTOMODULAR - INTENDS TO SEEK AN ORDER DISMISSING GM LITIGATION WITH PREJUDICE AND WITHOUT COSTS UPON RECEIPT OF SETTLEMENT FUNDS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
